title: "HLS Powers AI Revolution"
excerpt: "With the rapid growth of AI, there has been an industry-wide rush to find ways to accelerate AI inference. Numerous startups, as well as established chip companies, have rushed to come up with the best processor architecture that can outperform conventional CPUs at the massive convolutions that are required by convolutional neural networks ..."
